name: authorized_vehicles
description: This table contains all vehicles authorized to enter the bank premises.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier of an authorized vehicle.

columns.name: employee_id
columns.description: ID of the employee who is authorized to use this vehicle.

columns.name: production_year
columns.description: Year when the vehicle was produced.

columns.name: plate_number
columns.description: License plate number of the vehicle.
